description.raw:
before: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64&build=88)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/88/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/88/

~~~
CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:12 (find_package):
  By not providing "Findignition-cmake0.cmake" in CMAKE_MODULE_PATH this
  project has asked CMake to find a package configuration file provided by
  "ignition-cmake0", but CMake did not find one.

  Could not find a package configuration file provided by "ignition-cmake0"
  (requested version 0.3.0) with any of the following names:

    ignition-cmake0Config.cmake
    ignition-cmake0-config.cmake

  Add the installation prefix of "ignition-cmake0" to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or
  set "ignition-cmake0_DIR" to a directory containing one of the above files.
  If "ignition-cmake0" provides a separate development package or SDK, be
  sure it has been installed.
~~~


after: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64&build=89)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/89/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/89/
